summary:
If you are boring without duplicated Louis, this mod is suitable for you.

It can be harvested Louis on fertile soil was added in the hearthfire.
Harvested Louis is a follower. Have a nice trip with him.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48522-1-1386825101.png[/img]

It can be harvested Louis on fertile soil was added in the hearthfire.
Harvested Louis is a follower. Have a nice trip with him.

[b][color=yellow]Required: Hearthfire[/color][/b]
[b][color=yellow]Recommended mod: multifollower mods. For example, UFO, Extensible Follower Framework, Amazing Follower Tweaks, FollowerLivePackage...[/color][/b]


[size=+1][color=#ff8c00][b]How to cultivate[/b][/color][/size]

1. Buy seed of Louis in Arcadia's Cauldron, Whiterun.
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48522-2-1386235994.png[/img]

2. Plant seed in your soil.
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48522-3-1386235995.png[/img]

3. Harvest it when it sprouts.
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48522-4-1386235995.png[/img]

4. Harvested Louis has the seed. Take out the seed, let's cultivate it again.
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48522-5-1386235995.png[/img]


[size=+1][color=#ff8c00][b]Note[/b][/color][/size]
Louis is not essential. Harvested Louis from soil of skyrim talks as if he was the Nord.
[b][color=yellow]Up to ten Louis can follow the same time.[/color][/b]



[size=+1][color=#ff8c00][b]Cooperation[/b][/color][/size]
Script: tktk
Screenshot: DRAGONPORN
[url=http://dragonporn.ldblog.jp/]http://dragonporn.ldblog.jp/[/url]

[size=+1][color=#ff8c00][b]Special Thanks![/b][/color][/size]
RAN46
author: Higeyosi
